OOC: Cheer cheer cheer. Just keeping your characters warm for you.

BIC:

Spinister turned and nodded. He looked straight into Sluglsingers eyes,
then pointed to Hook's unmanned control console. He then looked at
Quake, and pointed at another weapon section.

Jagged walked out of the repair bay, hearing most of it. He held out his
sawed off shotgun. "No, I am not going to die for you insanity
Havotron." he shrieked, aiming his gun.

Slugslinger stood up as well, as Caliburst leapt into the air, changing
into his gun. "Yeah, i'm not this obsessed with the autobots." he
yelled, also pointing his guns at Havotron.
